TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IOHIDManagerOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Various options that can be supplied to IOHIDManager functions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDManagerOptions DoNotLoadProperties = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: This constant can be supplied to @link IOHIDManagerCreate when you wish to overwrite the persistent properties store without loading it first.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDManagerOptions DoNotSaveProperties = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: This constant can be supplied to @link IOHIDManagerCreate @/link when you want to use the persistent property store but do not want to add to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDManagerOptions None = unsigned int32(0)

Docs.summary: For those times when supplying 0 just isn't explicit enough.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDManagerOptions UsePersistentProperties = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: This constant can be supplied to @link IOHIDManagerCreate @/link to create and/or use a persistent properties store.
